definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Qingdao is a prime tourist  destination, with a beer  festival and a yacht culture.
sentences.chinese: 青島是個旅遊勝地，有著名的啤酒節和快艇文化。

sentences.english: Qingdao is a prime tourist destination, with a beer festival and a yacht culture.
sentences.chinese: 青島是個旅遊勝地，有著名的啤酒節和快艇文化。

sentences.english: At the beer festival, everyone was holding big cups and swigging down beers.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒節上，每個人都手拿大酒杯，開懷暢飲。

sentences.english: Which of the following about Oktoberfest is NOT true?
sentences.chinese: 以下哪些關於啤酒節的選項何者爲非？

definition: the Lantern Festival (15th of first month of lunar calendar)
time of day exactly on the hour (i.e. 12:00, 1:00 etc)/to make an inventory/(math.) point that has integer coordinates
to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
the first stick of incense placed in the censer (believed to bring good luck esp. during festivities)/(slang) (Tw) the first reply to a blog post etc

colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)
